paragraphs: The thirteenth Prague Coffee Festival 2025 will take place in Prague. It will last for two weekend days on November 15 and 16, and will offer visitors the opportunity to try over a hundred varieties of invigorating beverage from around the world.
The festival will take place in the exhibition hall of the Výstaviště Holešovice complex.

Guests can expect a rich variety of coffee from 50 Czech and foreign coffee roasteries. In one place, you will be able to try dozens of varieties prepared based on classic espresso or alternative methods (siphon, French press, pour-over, Aeropress, and other techniques).
The organizers will also prepare a rich accompanying program for visitors: lectures on coffee roasting and preparation methods, various master classes, musical performances, and much more.

Ticket sales have already started. Entrance for one day costs 449 crowns, and for both days - 619 crowns. For this money, the visitor will have the right to taste the presented coffee samples in unlimited quantities and attend all festival events.
📍 Where: Křižík's pavilions, Exhibition Grounds Holešovice, Prague 7;
🕘 When: November 15 and 16, 2025 (Saturday and Sunday) from 09:00 to 18:00;
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.
